verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. In my distress <WH6869> I cried <WH7121> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, And he answered me <WH6030>.
Deliver <WH5337> my soul <WH5315>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, from lying <WH8267> lips <WH8193>, And from a deceitful <WH7423> tongue <WH3956>.
What shall be given <WH5414> unto thee <WH3254>, and what shall be done more unto thee <WH7423>, Thou deceitful tongue <WH3956>?
Sharp <WH8150> arrows <WH2671> of the mighty <WH1368>, With coals <WH1513> of juniper <WH7574>.
Woe <WH190> is me <WH1481>, that I sojourn in Meshech <WH4902>, That I dwell <WH7931> among the tents <WH168> of Kedar <WH6938>!
My soul <WH5315> hath long <WH7227> had her dwelling <WH7931> With him that hateth <WH8130> peace <WH7965>.
I am for peace <WH7965>: But when I speak <WH1696>, they are for war <WH4421>.
